meanings.definition: To charm or captivate with beauty or attractiveness.
meanings.sent1: The young girl becharming everyone with her sweet smile.
meanings.sent2: She becharmingly greeted each guest at the party.
meanings.sent3: The magician becharmingly pulled a rabbit out of his hat.
meanings.sent4: The sunset becharmingly painted the sky with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The melody of the song becharmingly lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: Having the quality of being charming or enchanting.
meanings.sent1: The quaint cottage had a becharming garden filled with flowers.
meanings.sent2: The old bookstore had a becharming atmosphere that drew in customers.
meanings.sent3: The becharming little puppy wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: Her becharming smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The becharming story captured the hearts of all who read it.
